name: The Sentence Without A Country Multiple Choice Quiz | Brain Teasers | 15 Questions

questions.text: I saw the huge monster coming at me, so ________!
questions.explanation:
Iran.

	I saw the huge monster coming at me, so I ran!

questions.text: Those cherries are sour and need some sugar to _________ them.
questions.explanation:
Sweden.

	Those cherries are sour and need some sugar to sweeten them.

questions.text: Close that window, it's too _________ in here!
questions.explanation:
Chile.

	Close that window, it's too chilly in here!

questions.text: 'Them fancy yacht people! Them people with ______________ think they's better than all of us common folks!'
questions.explanation:
Botswana.

	'Them fancy yacht people! Them people with boats wanna think they's better than all of us common folks!'

questions.text: My neighbor slipped and fell in the store. He _________ won his case.
questions.explanation:
Sudan.

	My neighbor slipped and fell in the store. He sued and won his case.

questions.text: If you see the entrance to the ____________ the spot so you know where to find the bear.
questions.explanation:
Denmark.

	If you see the entrance to the den, mark the spot so you know where to find the bear.

questions.text: To get into Disneyland, I had to pay the entrance_________ whiz it was expensive!
questions.explanation:
Fiji.

	To get into Disneyland, I had to pay the entrance fee. Gee whiz it was expensive!

questions.text: Did ______________ paper airplane in school today?
questions.explanation:
Jamaica.

	Did you make a paper airplane in school today?

questions.text: If ______________ your neck far enough out the window, you'll see the billboard.
questions.explanation:
Ukraine.

	If you crane your neck far enough out the window, you'll see the billboard.

Tibet.

	I went to Las Vegas to bet.

questions.text: He used _____________ stone for the mosaic.
questions.explanation:
Thailand.

	He used tile and stone for the mosaic.

questions.text: If you can't reach the kite, use a ____________ knock it from the tree.
questions.explanation:
Poland.

	If you can't reach the kite, use a pole and knock it from the tree.

Cuba.

	Isn't a cube a six-sided solid?

questions.text: There wasn't a _____________ place in the sterilized hospital ward.
questions.explanation:
Germany.

	There wasn't a germ any place in the sterilized hospital ward.

questions.text: OK, you got it on your left foot. Now put the other _______ your right foot!
questions.explanation:
Bhutan.

	OK, you got it on your left foot. Now put the other boot on your right foot!
